TELBOT_HELPER_NOT_ALLOWED: You are not allowed to command me.
TELBOT_NOT_REGISTERED_COMMAND: Sorry, that command is not registered.
TELBOT_HELP:
Show description of commands.
e.g) `/help commands`.
TELBOT_HELP_HELP: To show description of command, try `/help [command_name]`
TELBOT_MODULES: List of current installed modules on SmartMirror.
TELBOT_ALLOWUSER: Allow user temporally. This user will lost permission after restart.
TELBOT_ONLY_ADMIN: Sorry, only admin are allowed for this command.
TELBOT_ALLOWUSER_REGISTERED:
User is registered.
Try `/allowed` for check.
This user will lost permission after restart.
TELBOT_ALLOWUSER_ERROR: I cannot register this user. check the spell or username missing.
